categories.title: Naval History
categories.description: Important figures, dates, and events for the US Navy

questions.question: The Continental Navy was created by Congress on October 13th of what year?

When is the Navy's "birthday"?
Who uttered the famous quote "I have not yet begun to fight"?

categories.title: First Aid

questions.question: The three primary tasks of First Aid are to maintain airway, breathing, and what?

What do you NOT do when treating burns?
How many types of heat injuries are there?
NEVER attempt CPR procedures unless you have received what?
Transport a victim head first up ladders while using a what?

What is the freezing of the deep layers of tissue called?

What do you call bleeding that is bright red/maroon blood and oozing from a wound?

Freezing injuries are characterized by the formation of what?
How many types of fractures are there?

Shallow, irregular, and rapid breathing is a symptom of what?

answers.answer: Allow the victim to see the injury

questions.question: When a body's sweating mechanism breaks down it is symptomatic of what?

What does the letter “T” indicate is held in a shipboard compartment?

If you are on the center-line, looking forward, which side of the ship is to your left?
To go from compartment 1-56-4-L to 1-94-4-M, which way do you go?
Which is the portion of the ship above the main deck called?
What is the backbone of a ship called?
What is the after most part of the ship called?
What do you call the space where personnel command the ship when at sea?
What term refers to the rear of the ship?
What do you call the furthest aft part of the main deck of a ship?
What do you call an air or foam filled bumper that keeps vessels from banging into docks or each other?
Where in relation to the centerline are compartments 1-55-4-L and 02-82-2-E?
How would you get from 1-82-2-L to 02-42-3-L?

answers.answer: Up three decks, aft and port
Down three decks, forward and port
Down two decks, aft and starboard
Up two decks, forward and starboard

categories.title: Damage Control

questions.question: The _____ is the most often used patch for temporarily repairing a ruptured pipe.

3 rings of the ships bell over IMC

answers.answer: Control stability and buoyancy of ship

questions.question: What are acts or verbal expressions of consideration or respect for others?

answers.answer: You Will Not Tread On Me

answers.answer: Nothing, a Boatswain’s pipe is sounded

answers.answer: Come to attention facing the flag

answers.answer: Come to attention facing the flag

answers.answer: Come to attention facing the flag
